thread.title: #BlackPantherChallenge raises thousands for kids to see upcoming movie

title: #BlackPantherChallenge raises thousands for kids to see upcoming movie
text:
#BlackPantherChallenge raises thousands for kids to see upcoming movie 7:28am EST - 01:49 
New York native, Frederick Joseph, spearheaded a social media campaign dubbed #BlackPantherChallenge, which raised over $300,000 to send kids to see highly anticipated Marvel super hero movie, Black Panther. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
New York native, Frederick Joseph, spearheaded a social media campaign dubbed #BlackPantherChallenge, which raised over $300,000 to send kids to see highly anticipated Marvel super hero movie, Black Panther.
